summary:
Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Walmart-owned Flipkart has kicked off its 'Big Bachat Days' sale, providing enticing discounts on a variety of smartphones from January 1 to January 5, 2025.

  • Discounts of up to ₹7,000 on Apple’s iPhone 16 series.
  • Google’s Pixel 9 series discounted by up to ₹10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 discounted by ₹12,500.
  • EMI plans of up to 24 months offered for HDFC Bank cardholders.
  • Sale includes offers on various brands like Motorola, Xiaomi, and Vivo.
“The iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB) is available for ₹137,900, down from ₹144,900.”

In conclusion, Flipkart's 'Big Bachat Days' sale offers significant savings for smartphone buyers looking to upgrade their devices in early 2025.
newTitle: Flipkart Launches 2025 'Big Bachat Days' Sale with Major Discounts on Popular Smartphones

India's retail sector is experiencing significant growth, marked by a projected 50% increase in retail space by 2028 and an industry valuation of over $1 trillion in 2023.

title: Poco X7 5G series launch date confirmed: Key features and specifications revealed - India TV News
summary:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Key Features and Specifications Revealed

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: India TV News

The Poco X7 5G series is all set to launch in India on January 9, featuring the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G models. The devices will be available on Flipkart, showcasing exciting design elements and robust specifications.

  • The Poco X7 5G includes a centrally located squircle-shaped rear camera and may be available in silver and green.
  • The Poco X7 Pro features a pill-shaped camera module and could sport a dual-tone black and green finish.
  • Performance is powered by MediaTek processors: Dimensity 8400-Ultra for the Pro and Dimensity 7300-Ultra for the standard model.
  • The Pro model is expected to have a 50MP primary camera, while the standard version may include a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • Both phones are expected to have IP68 water and dust resistance ratings.
  • Display specifications include a 6.67-inch AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate for both models, and battery capacities of 5,110mAh for the X7 and 6,000mAh for the Pro.
"The Poco X7 5G series is expected to make a big splash in the Indian market upon its release."

With a combination of compelling specifications and attractive design, the Poco X7 5G series aims to attract a significant audience upon its launch.
newTitle: Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed with Specifications

title: Apple may be considering high refresh rate screens for all iPhone 17 series models - The Indian Express
summary:
Apple May Introduce High Refresh Rate Displays in All iPhone 17 Models

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Apple, known for its premium smartphones, may change its strategy regarding display technology. Recent leaks suggest that high-refresh-rate displays could be available in all iPhone 17 models, a shift from the previous exclusivity to Pro variants.

  • High-refresh-rate “ProMotion” displays may be introduced in the iPhone 17 series.
  • Possible use of LTPO panels across all models, enhancing display capabilities compared to LTPS panels currently used.
  • Support for always-on display features will be available.
  • The entire series may feature a new anti-reflective, scratch-resistant display.
  • Introduction of a new model rumored to replace the iPhone 17 Plus, possibly named “Slim” or “Air”.
“The non-Pro models in the iPhone 15 and iPhone 16 series use LTPS panels, which have a maximum refresh rate of just 60Hz.”

This update could significantly enhance user experience across the iPhone 17 lineup, as consumers may benefit from improved display technologies previously limited to higher-end models.
newTitle: Apple May Introduce High Refresh Rate Displays in All iPhone 17 Models

Kati Patang Lifestyle, a craft beer maker, aims to expand its operations by acquiring and incubating small alcohol businesses as it recently went public through a share swap.

  • The company will grow both organically and inorganically over the next two years.
  • Its recent acquisition includes a stake in a UK brewery.
  • Kati Patang seeks to foster expansion while developing its own brands.
“We are looking to acquire and incubate domestic and international brands,” said co-founder Shantanu Upadhyay.

Kati Patang's strategy indicates a focused approach on scaling operations in the competitive alcohol market.

title: Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat - India.com
summary:
Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat

Published Date: N/A Source: India.com

Vinod Channa, the fitness trainer who assisted Anant Ambani in his notable weight loss journey, provides three key strategies to effectively reduce belly fat.

How to Reduce Belly Fat in 3 Steps?

  1. Eat at regular intervals: Channa emphasizes the importance of regular eating to keep metabolism active without stressing the intestinal system.
  2. Work on abs at the right time: The optimal time for abs workouts is after larger muscle exercises to maximize calorie burn.
  3. Work on all muscle groups: Target all major abdominal muscles for comprehensive results.

Channa also stresses that each individual's weight loss journey is unique and tailored nutrition plans are essential.

About Vinod Channa

Vinod Channa is a highly sought-after celebrity fitness trainer known for his holistic approach to fitness and nutrition.
newTitle: Vinod Channa's Tips for Reducing Belly Fat

title: Mswipe bets big on international expansion | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
Mswipe bets big on international expansion

Publication Date: 31 December 2023

Source: Mint

Mswipe, a payments fintech backed by Alpha Wave Global, is set to expand its operations into regions like the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal to leverage higher margins. This follows a recent successful entry into the UAE and Singapore.

  • Mswipe is focusing on international expansion after a year of marginal revenue growth.
  • The plan includes entering markets such as the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal within the next six months.
  • The company aims to improve its profit margins through this strategic expansion.
“We are targeting high-margin markets to boost our growth,” said co-founder and CEO Ketan Patel.

This expansion reflects Mswipe's efforts to adapt its business strategy and improve financial outcomes amid market fluctuations.
newTitle: Mswipe Expands Internationally to Enhance Growth

summary:
OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

OnePlus is set to unveil its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13R, at an event on January 7, alongside the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus Watch 3. This device is projected to be a key competitor in the premium mid-range segment for 2025.

OnePlus 13R expected specifications:

  • 6.78-inch 8T LTPO AMOLED display with 4,500 nits peak brightness.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor with Adreno 750 GPU.
  • Support for up to 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB of UFS 4.0 storage.
  • Triple camera setup with 50MP primary sensor, likely including a telephoto lens.
  • 16MP front camera.
  • IP65 rating for dust and splash resistance.
  • Expected to run OxygenOS 15 on Android 15.

In China, pricing starts at 3399 yuan for 12GB RAM/256GB storage model. Possible Indian price around ₹40,000 is still to be confirmed at the launch.
newTitle: OnePlus 13R launching in India on January 7: Price, design, specs and everything expected

The article discusses the upcoming trends that are expected to influence the smartphone market in 2025, despite perceived stagnation in the industry. Key trends include the introduction of slimmer designs, enhanced AI features, improved security measures, and a focus on repairability.

  • Smartphones may have slimmer designs, with companies like Apple and Samsung introducing new models.
  • Greater integration of AI features to create personalized user experiences.
  • Enhanced security measures to protect against increasing cyber threats.
  • New software features to help curb smartphone addiction.
  • A push towards more repairable technology.

Is the MCX Stock Set for a Rally?

Publication Date: November 20, 2023 Source: Live Mint

With technology upgrades and the launch of a new platform in 2023, followed by the introduction of new products, the Multi Commodity Exchange of India Ltd. (MCX) solidifies its position as the leading commodity derivatives exchange in India.

  • Catering to over 90% of India’s commodity derivative trades.
  • Facilitates price discovery and provides price risk management tools.
  • Established in 2003 under SEBI’s regulatory framework.
“The introduction of new products will significantly impact MCX's operations.”

This development signals a promising future for MCX, especially with its expanding role in India’s commodity trading landscape.
